name: contracts
description: **Foundry is a blazing fast, portable and modular toolkit for Ethereum application development written in Rust.**

scripts.deploy:chiliz-verifier: forge create --rpc-url https://rpc.ankr.com/chiliz --legacy --private-key $(grep PRIVATE_KEY .env | cut -d '=' -f2) src/Verifier.sol:Halo2Verifier
